import java.util.*;
class Statues
{
	public static void main(String[] args)
	{
		Scanner sc=new Scanner(System.in);
		int n,count=0,ans,x,i;
		while(true)
		{
			n=sc.nextInt();
			if(n==0)
				break;
			x=0;
			ans=0;
			int[] arr=new int[n];
			for(i=0;i<n;i++)
			{
				arr[i]=sc.nextInt();
				x+=arr[i];
			}
			x=x/n;
			for(i=0;i<n;i++)
			{
				if(arr[i]<x)
					ans+=x-arr[i];
			}
			count++;
			System.out.println("Set #"+count);
			System.out.println("The minimum number of moves is "+ans+".\n");
		}
	}
}
